current.factory_location_description: Located in Qingdao, Shandong, China, the factory has a bright and spacious atmosphere that employs innovative manufacturing methods. We are committed to high standards of quality, environmental sustainability, and safety for all employees. The average employee age is 41 and 76% of our employees are women, mostly from local communities. Staff enjoy three daily meals, eight-hour work days, weekends, holiday leave, and worker insurance. The factory boasts one of the lowest turnover rates in the industry, with each employee staying over five years on average.
current.factory_found_description: Committed to finding a factory partner that aligned with our values, we spent 11 months tirelessly auditing a total of 32 factories before finally selecting the one. From the initial visit, we were immediately impressed by the honesty and dedication of the owner, who works at the factory himself.
current.factory_material_description: From sourcing our materials to curating our signature shades, we strive for excellence every step of the way. Our hair is sourced directly from verified distributors who have a long-standing reputation for ethically sourcing quality human hair. All hair is sold or exchanged freely and fairly.
current.factory_owner_description: Born in Shandong, China, the owner of the factory brings nearly three decades of expertise in the hair industry. Founded in 2006, the factory began in a small workshop with only nine employees. Today, it employs over 200 staff and occupies two vast facilities.
current.factory_intro_description: We believe in creating premium products, providing unbeatable customer service, and transparency. Step inside our factory and learn more about how and where our products are made.
current.factory_product_title: Premium quality, 100% Remy human hair extensions.
current.factory_product_description: Luxy Hair extensions are made entirely from Remy human hair. Remy hair is the highest grade of human hair with the cuticles kept intact to prevent tangling and prolong the lifespan of your extensions. The hair is meticulously sorted to select only the finest strands of desired length and aligned in a unidirectional fashion. This process ensures that the hair remains ultra soft, shiny, silky, and tangle-free throughout its lifetime.
current.factory_product_prices_description:
We are a direct-to-consumer company, allowing us to pass the savings on to you! As a leading 
hair extensions brand, we produce a high volume of products each year, giving us the benefit of greater economies of scale. The result? Premium quality clip-in hair extensions without the luxury price tag!
current.factory_product_packaging_description:
Environmental consideration is top of mind at Luxy Hair. Along with sourcing our hair ethically, all of our accessories are made from sustainable and environmentally-friendly materials. Plus,  
our hair extensions are packaged in a recyclable box made with FSC paper and printed with soy ink. Durable and elegant, our  packaging is designed to be reused.
current.factory_description_1: Transparency is important to us. From ethically sourced materials to sustainable packaging, care for the environment and our communities is at the heart of what we do.
current.factory_description_2: "It's not easy to find a manufacturing partner that feels like a natural extension of your own business."
current.gdpr_notice_description: This site uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience. Learn more.

current.product_shipping_description: All prices on the website include FREE standard shipping to applicable countries. Your clip-in Luxy Hair extensions ship from our warehouse in Utah (USA). You can exchange or refund your order within 60 days.

current.collection_description_collections: Clip-in Luxy Hair extensions are made from 100% straight remy human hair, and come in a full head set.

current.collection_description_products: If you need help with choosing a color, watch this {{ video }} on how to select your closest match or {{ email }} a photo of your hair taken in natural light. We'll be happy to help.
current.support_description: Got a styling question? Need some hair advice? We’re always here to help. Slide into our DMs or drop us a line and we’ll get back to you within 24 hours, 7 days a week.
current.why_hero_description: Get longer, fuller hair in just 5 minutes with clip-in Luxy Hair extensions.
current.why_title: Counting down the top 10 reasons to choose Luxy Hair.
current.why_description_1: No hairstylist? No problem! Clipping in Luxy Hair extensions is easy to do yourself in just minutes.
current.why_description_2: When it comes to your hair, instant gratification is a good thing. We don’t think you should have to live with a bad haircut or hair that just won’t grow fast enough. Luxy Hair extensions will give you long hair without the wait.
current.why_description_3: A set of Luxies will transform your hair from flat to voluminous for that sexy fullness you’ve been longing for.
current.why_description_4: Craving a change but don’t want to dye your hair? Experiment with highlights that never grow out.
current.why_description_5: Unlike other types of hair extensions, Luxies can be clipped in or taken out whenever you want. Best of all, they’re totally safe to wear every day and cause zero damage to your natural hair.
current.why_image_alt_6: Every Day is a New Hair Day
current.why_description_6: We think a girl should have options. Try out a new hairstyle for special events like a wedding, prom, or a hot date. Nothing planned? Rock a new ‘do every day of the week!
current.why_title_7: We treat you like a friend.
current.why_description_7: Got a styling question? Need some hair advice? We’re always here to help. Slide into our DMs or drop us a line and we’ll get back to you within 24 hours, 7 days a week.
current.why_title_8: FREE SHIPPING TO US, CANADA & MORE!
current.why_description_8: Ain't no mountain high enough that will keep us from getting your Luxies to you! We offer free shipping to many major countries around the world.
current.why_description_9: Made from 100% Remy human hair and manufactured with care, Luxy Hair extensions are truly premium. Heat ‘em, style ‘em, wear ‘em as you please—your Luxies are made to last. Plus, as a direct-to-consumer company, we pass our savings onto you.
current.why_description_10:
We go to great lengths to keep your hair feeling fresh every week. 
With more than 400 video tutorials, hair care guides, and styling tips, we’ve combed through it all to bring you the very best when it comes to all things hair.

current.beforeafter_video_description: They will instantly transform your natural hair into full, long, gorgeous “mermaid” locks! It only takes a few minutes to clip them in, but the difference is tremendous!

current.ombre_hero_alt_text: Ombre hair extensions by Luxy Hair
current.collection_landing_thumbnail_text_1: Clip-in hair extensions with a flexible, fabric-stitched base that add extra volume at the roots. Choose from 3 weights for the perfect blend. Suitable for all hair thicknesses.
current.collection_landing_thumbnail_text_2: Clip-in hair extensions with a thin, silicone base that’s virtually undetectable in thin hair. Available in one weight. Suitable for thin and medium hair.
current.collection_landing_thumbnail_text_3: Clip-in hair extensions perfect for adding volume and achieving mid-length hair. Offered in our classic weft. Available in one weight.
current.collection_landing_thumbnail_text_4: Clip-in hair extensions perfect for already highlighted hair or if you’re looking to experiment with color. No commitment, no dye, no damage. Offered in our seamless weft.
current.collection_landing_thumbnail_text_5: An individual 4-clip weft to give extra fullness and blend to your set of Luxies. Ain’t nothing wrong with being a little extra.
current.collection_landing_thumbnail_text_6: A specially designed range of accessories to help you store, style, and maintain your Luxies, so they have a long and happy life.
current.homepage_content_description:
FREE Shipping

High quality and affordable

Super quick and easy to use

Instant length and volume

Absolutely NO damage

60-day exchanges and returns
current.homepage_thumbnails_description_1: Soft, fabric-stitched wefts for extra volume.

current.homepage_reviews_text_1: "I am in love!! I wear them everyday and always get so many compliments on how real they look! I love that I can do so many different styles with them and feel beautiful wearing them!"
current.homepage_reviews_text_2: "These extensions are so amazing! Perfect color, texture, length. My friends always comment on how real they look and feel. I can confidently say I'm obssessed."
current.homepage_reviews_text_3: "Thanks Luxy Hair for making my hair dreams come true! I couldn't have been happier. I got the midtone between my highlights and lowlights and it looked perfect. It gave me just the extra volume I needed."

current.cart_shipping_description_eu: Shipping to the EU is fast and FREE from our Netherlands warehouse (1-5 business days). VAT (value-added tax) is paid upfront, which guarantees faster shipping and NO surprise fees upon delivery. This tax is paid to the Dutch government and is not collected by Luxy Hair.

current.cart_shipping_description: All international orders may be subject to customs and duty fees upon arrival in the destination country. These fees are paid to your local carrier or government and are not collected by Luxy Hair, therefore cannot be refunded, even if the package is refused. For more information, please click here.
current.about_testimonial_description_1: Thanks Luxy Hair for making my hair dreams come true! I couldn't have been happier. I got the midtone between my highlights and lowlights and it looked perfect. It gave me just the extra volume I needed.
current.about_testimonial_description_2: I heard about Luxy Hair Extensions through a close friend and saw how thick, full and shiny her hair looked! Once I went on your site, I realized how simple and affordable you guys made it for me to get the hair I've always wanted.
current.about_testimonial_description_3: I am in love!! I wear them everyday and always get so many compliments on how real they look! I love that I can do so many different styles with them and feel beautiful wearing them!

The hair is meticulously sorted to select only the finest strands of desired length. This process ensures that the hair remains ultra soft, shiny, silky and tangle-free throughout its lifetime.
current.factory_image_quote: "It's not easy to find a manufacturing partner that feels like a natural extension of your own business."
current.factory_map_description:
Located in Qingdao, Shandong, China, our factory has all the right attributes: it utilizes bright spacious facilities, modern methods, provides comfortable conditions and convenience for local communities.

Luxy Hair full-time dedicated staff work alongside factory quality managers to monitor all production processes for compliance with rigid standards of quality, environment and safety. Average employee age is 41 comprised of 76% women, mostly from local communities. Employees are provided with three daily meals, eight-hour work days, weekends, holiday leave, and worker insurance.
current.factory_product_image_caption: Luxy Hair extensions are real remy human clip-in hair extensions. Remy hair is considered to be the highest grade of human hair extensions because the cuticles are kept intact, which prevents tangling and substantially prolongs product lifespan.

current.about_description:
Hi, thank you for stopping by! We are Luxy Hair - a clip-in hair extensions company. We believe that everyone deserves to have the hair of their dreams. That’s why we’re here - to help you transform and LOVE your hair!

Above all, we believe in bringing value to every single one of you by providing exceptional products, resources, and customer service.

✓ Choose your perfect set with our easy-peasy guide

settings.author: Victoria
settings.content: These are extensions that you can clip in when you want long and thick hair, and just clip out at the end of the night. What a wonderful invention, I was thrilled, and I felt beautiful.

settings.author: McKenna
settings.content: When I finally had my Luxy Hair in and styled, I looked in the mirror, and began to tear up. I couldn’t believe it...I had my hair back. The extensions made my hair look just like it had before I had gotten sick, maybe even better.

settings.author: Kheyra
settings.content: I couldn’t believe how natural they looked! All the years wishing I could have long hair were long over, and I had learned to accept the hair that I had, but my extensions gave me just a little more confidence.

settings.heading: The Life-changing Magic of Luxy Hair
settings.content: Luxy Hair extensions are helping women around the world feel confident, beautiful, and empowered. We’re so grateful and humbled to be a part of your transformation.

settings.heading: What Makes Us A Great Place To Work
settings.description: Our priority is creating an inspiring and supportive environment, where people love to spend their time and are motivated to do their best work.

settings.heading: We are a full-time remote workforce!
settings.description: Enjoy the freedom and flexibility of working remotely. As a full-time remote workforce, you are free to work from anywhere so long as you can work 8 hours a day and are available during core business hours (Monday-Friday 10 AM to 4 PM EST).

settings.heading: We're a Great Place to Work!
settings.description:
Luxy Hair is Great Place to Work certified. We are committed to upholding a wellness positive office environment where everyone feels healthy, happy, and fulfilled.

As the #1 rated clip-in hair extensions brand in the world, we take the same people-first approach with our customers. Since 2010, we’ve strived to go beyond beautiful hair by inspiring confidence and empowering people to look and feel their best. Over the years, we’ve been able to impact the lives and transform the hair of over 250K+ customers worldwide.

To see more updates on what we're up to at Luxy Hair HQ, click here to follow our LinkedIn page.

settings.heading: Luxy Hair® is the #1 highest rated hair extensions brand worldwide.
What are Luxy Hair extensions?
settings.description:
The easiest way to get longer, thicker hair in minutes–right at home

Can be washed, heat styled, and dyed like your own hair

Made from premium quality,

100% Remy human hair

Causes absolutely zero damage to your natural hair

Sourced ethically and made sustainably

settings.title: United States
settings.heading: U.S. Shipping terms
settings.description: FREE shipping on all orders (1-3 business days, excluding territories). FREE exchanges. Buy now, pay later.

settings.title: Canada
settings.heading: Canada shipping terms
settings.description: FREE shipping on select orders (10-15 business days). Rates may vary. May be subject to customs.

settings.title: International
settings.heading: International shipping terms
settings.description: All international orders may be subject to customs and duty fees upon arrival in the destination country. These fees are paid to your local carrier or government and are not collected by Luxy Hair, therefore cannot be refunded, even if the package is refused.
